main.name: Michael Chang
main.description: I'm very passionate about Python, C++, JavaScript, NodeJS, Web and App development, working out, work-life balance, self-improvements, and continuous learning.
main.bio: As a Computer Science student, I'm open to internship and Coop, and I hope I can apply what I learned from school into my future career. I also love to challenge myself to learn new technologies as I'm moving forward.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Part of the Vancouver based Senior Living Software development team.
Develop powerful backend APIs in NodeJS, micro services and analytics to serve cutting edge features and data to the end user.
Build sleek, responsive UIs on both the web and mobile in Angular.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Collaborated with researchers to expore and develop better tools for them to optimize their research.
Developed a web application with Flask to help researchers to organize their patient's data.
Created a database for storage and retrieval of data from biodistribution studies used in the development of radiopharmaceuticals.

work.title: Software Developer (Volunteer)
description: Investigated the auto body shop business need to seek solutions for providing better customer expeorience on the website.
Developed a mobile application version of the website for later development using React Native for frontend development, and Django framework for the backend.

projects.title: Pomo Lofi App

testimonials.text: When you think you lost everything you really haven't. The opportunity to rebuild show me that you can take risk, that failure is not final, dust yourself off, and get going again.

If you give your mind something meaningful to do throughout all your waking hours, you'll end the day more fulfilled, and begin the next one more relaxed, than if you instead allow your mind to bathe for hours in semiconscious and unstructured web surfing
